info.game_comments: (Jon: So you bought the Louisiana Territory, but what exactly's out there?  We'll find out with Lewis & Clark, coming up on Jeopardy!)

double_jeopardy_round: U.S. CABINET DEPARTMENTS IN OTHER WORDS
